description: Lists tags that are attached to the specified resource. You can attach tags to the following resources in Organizations. This operation can be called only from the organization's management account or by a member account that is a delegated administrator.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource with the tags to list. You can specify any of the following taggable resources. Amazon Web Services account --- specify the account ID number. Organizational unit --- specify the OU ID that begins with ou- and looks similar to: ou-1a2b-34uvwxyz Root --- specify the root ID that begins with r- and looks similar to: r-1a2b Policy --- specify the policy ID that begins with p- andlooks similar to: p-12abcdefg3

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags that are assigned to the resource.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If present, indicates that more output is available than is included in the current response. Use this value in the NextToken request parameter in a subsequent call to the operation to get the next part of the output. You should repeat this until the NextToken response element comes back as null.
